content: This article **needs additional citations for verification**. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. *Find sources:* "S.N.A.P." – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(August 2025)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* **S.N.A.P.** ([Chinese](/wiki/Simplified_Chinese_characters): 熠熠星光总动员, formally known as 全星总动员) was a Singaporean television talent competition by [Channel i](/wiki/Channel_i_(Singaporean_TV_channel)) to find the next star. The show was hosted by [Bryan Wong](/wiki/Bryan_Wong) and [Kym Ng](/wiki/Kym_Ng). After running for 3 seasons, the producers of the show decided to change show's Chinese title. Similar from previous seasons, contestants are scouted on the streets and shopping malls. The show hosts will be broken into 2 teams to choose their contestants and let the public vote to decide the winner of the different categories each week. This is the 4th installation from the previous seasons, last aired in 2004. ## Hosts [Lee Teng](/wiki/Lee_Teng_(Singapore)) and [Zhou Ying](/wiki/Zhou_Ying_(actress)) were confirmed to be joining the show as a new addition while the other team is made up of former season host [Bryan Wong](/wiki/Bryan_Wong) and [Kym Ng](/wiki/Kym_Ng). ## Season 4 Contestants EPStar Search Theme:LocationWinnerDate Aired1.明星公主ARC/VivoCityFenny Chandra20 Sept 20122.人气男红星Wisma AtriaBenjamin Khoh27 Sept 20123.熟男熟女Parkway ParadeDiana Tanvis4 Oct 20124.淘气宝宝Jurong PointAudrey Soh11 Oct 20125.人气女红星Marina Square[Seraphine Sng](/wiki/Seraph_Sun)18 Oct 20126.新生代偶像派Bugis Junction/Bugis +Alan Chang25 Oct 20127.超级红星Tampines 1Kho Hui Ting1 Nov 20128.明星公主/ 人气男红星/ 熟男熟女PK战Wisma Atria Cathay Cineleisure Orchard9.淘气宝宝/ 人气女红星/ 新生代偶像派/ 超级红星PK战Bugis Junction / CityLink / Marina SquareFinals15 Nov 2012 This Singaporean television-related article is a stub.
